title: New Skins and art - Marquis Vlad?
body:
Oh dear lord.

Someone tell me who drew this.  I want to see their other work. 

*fans self*  

I didn't think that much of Vlad before, although he had promise.  But THIS holy HECK someone get a hose, I need a cold shower.  <3

replies.body: The splash was started by one of our outsourcing partners and finished by Riot OwlyCat. She also worked on Blade Mistress Morgana, Leopard Nidalee, Nightraven Fiora and Royal Guard Fiora. I'll let her know how much you loved it!
Please tell me she is working on the Twitch splash arts

She worked a bit on Medieval Twitch, but most of Twitch is being worked on by 3rdColossus who also did the Yorick base Splash and worked on Undertaker Yorick. As the art lead HUGEnFAST generally works a little on ALL the splashes we put out on ChampUP as well.
Is hugenfast doing Kingpin or is someone else on it?

Most of our skin splashes are started by our outsourcing partners. They usually get the splash to 80% and then we finish them in house. 3rdColossus is working on Kingpin. It's amazing too!

HUGEnFAST was focused on the PreSeason Assassin piece and is also working on finishing Gangster Twitch.
how soon will see the new Twitch splashes?

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7cU38zYL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-23T16:09:16.557+0000)
>
> The splash was started by one of our outsourcing partners and finished by Riot OwlyCat. She also worked on Blade Mistress Morgana, Leopard Nidalee, Nightraven Fiora and Royal Guard Fiora. I'll let her know how much you loved it!

Now of only Morgana could look as beautiful in game as she does in her splash.
All of those splash arts you mentioned look so amazing. Nightraven Fiora is my favorite. She did a really great job.

omg c:

does she also know where I can find IRL people that look like that Vlad splash
She is really a great Artist, am already a big fan of her work , i Hope she will be the one who works on MF splash's {{champion:21}}

His old splash used to be on my favorites in the game and I don't even play him. The new one is good and clear and has really good quality. But the old one had attitude, his pose with his arms spread and legs crossed with his head tilted back in the spotlight <3
